thread.title: 'Trump has taken a mother from her children'
thread.title_full: 'Trump has taken a mother from her children' - BBC News

author: BBC
title: 'Trump has taken a mother from her children'
text:
The mother-of-two who was detained on Wednesday when she went for a routine check-in with US immigration officials says Donald Trump's crack down on illegal immigrants is "unfair".
Guadalupe Garcia de Rayos, 36, has lived in the US for more than 20 years.
"I think it was unfair because I was working," she said.
"I'm not taking anything away from anyoneâ€¦ instead he's taking away my children's right to be with their mother," she added.
Read more Mexico warns citizens in US after woman deported
